alert.note: Alert for Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 24 at 10:09PM MDT until further notice by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Minor flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Along Rapid Creek from near the fairgrounds in Rapid City downstream to the Cheyenne River. * WHEN...Until 645 PM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding of Rapid Creek as well as other low-lying and flood-prone locations along Rapid Creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1002 PM MDT, Light to moderate rain continues to fall along Rapid Creek. This is in addition to the 1 to 3 inches of heavy rain that fell in a short period of time late this afternoon and early evening, causing Rapid Creek to rise to near bankfull. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.5 inches are possible in the warned area tonight. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Eastern Rapid City, Rapid Valley, Farmingdale and Caputa.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
